question: COVID-19 Shri Shakti Challenge, which was seen in news recently, is organised by MyGov in collaboration with organisation?
explanation:
COVID-19 Shri Shakti Challenge was organized by MyGov in collaboration with UN Women. It was seen in news because six women led start-ups have won the challenge.
The challenge, which was launched in April 2020 aimed to encourage women led start-ups to come up with innovative solutions to fight against COVID19 or solve problems faced by women community.
